translation.en: No. No, no, no. I know. Shh.

translation.en: Here's the bad news, sports fans: It's a little late.

translation.en: you know, because you need it. But why don't I

translation.en: or this is going to the next level, you got that?

translation.en: Catch phrase?

translation.en: Jack, Jack, Jack. Come on. Take it easy. Take it easy.

translation.en: the business will take care of you.

translation.en: Uh-huh. So would you say you got something special working there?

translation.en: Yeah, she's around.

translation.en: My help cometh from the Lord, which made Heaven and Earth.

translation.en: The Lord is thy keeper.

translation.en: and even for evermore. Amen."

translation.en: Hey.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: Around the bar.

translation.en: You know how it goes.

translation.en: No.

translation.en: I don't know.

translation.en: They must be hearing it from you.

translation.en: Am I right? Oh, you simple bitch.

translation.en: Can you hold on a second?

translation.en: Can I help you with something? I'm Jack Carter.

translation.en: Richie's brother.

translation.en: Uh, Christ. I'm sorry I wasn't at the funeral,

translation.en: but I never could take them.

translation.en: No, I'm fine, thanks.

translation.en: and go out driving in a rainstorm?

translation.en: Not to me. Me either.

translation.en: I think he was taken out.

translation.en: Richie?

translation.en: There's something you're not telling me, Cliff.

translation.en: What the hell does that mean? Just relax.

translation.en: Listen, I don't like hard cases coming in here

translation.en: and talking to me like I know something.

translation.en: If there's someone putting out something about me,

translation.en: I wanna know who it is. When I know what is it

translation.en: and who's saying it, I might take the matter up with you.

translation.en: Mightn't I?

translation.en: You're a big man, but you're out of shape.

translation.en: With me, it's a full-time job. So please, sit down.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: Now, I know you got security cameras around the bar.

translation.en: Did the police ask to look at the tapes?

translation.en: You know this for sure?

translation.en: What can I tell you? It wasn't a big thing.

translation.en: Not many people knew about it.

translation.en: JACK: Cyrus.

translation.en: How you doing?

translation.en: Holy shit.

translation.en: Well, if it ain't the Vegas man with the Vegas tan.

translation.en: Geraldine, right?

translation.en: So I went to the bar to say goodbye, and he followed me out.
translation.zh: 于是我去酒吧想跟他分手他追了出来

translation.en: And he makes this big scene outside the bar.
translation.zh: 他在酒吧外大闹了一场

translation.en: I hear he got pretty drunk.
translation.zh: 我听说他喝醉了

translation.en: Look, I don't wanna talk about this anymore.
translation.zh: 听着 我不想再提这件事了

translation.en: The keys are in it.
translation.zh: 钥匙在里面

translation.en: THORPEY: Carter.
translation.zh: 卡特

translation.en: Looks like the rain must have backed up the sewer.
translation.zh: 看来雨水把下水道堵住了

translation.en: How you been, man?
translation.zh: 你怎么样 哥们？

translation.en: Still hanging around here, Thorpey? I like it here.
translation.zh: -还在这一带混呢 索普？-我喜欢这里

translation.en: I gotta have a word with you, all right?
translation.zh: 我有事想跟你说

translation.en: And, uh, confidential.
translation.zh: 不能张扬

translation.en: You just stay in the car. I'll listen. So, what do you wanna tell me?
translation.zh: 你就在车里说 我听着就是了说吧 想告诉我什么事？

translation.en: How you been, man? I mean, you look good.
translation.zh: -你过得怎么样？你气色不错-谢谢

translation.en: Thank you. I'm losing sleep here. So, what do you want?
translation.zh: -你过得怎么样？你气色不错-谢谢 就是有点缺觉闲话少说 你想怎么样？

translation.en: Here, take this. It's free.
translation.zh: 给 拿着 免费的

translation.en: Alaska Airlines, first class. That's nice.
translation.zh: -阿拉斯加航空头等舱-不错嘛

translation.en: And who do I have to thank?
translation.zh: 我该感谢谁？

translation.en: I've been asked to make sure you get on that plane. Tonight.
translation.zh: 有人让我把你弄上飞机 就今晚

translation.en: Whatever they're paying you, it ain't gonna be enough.
translation.zh: 不管他们付了你多少钱 那都不够

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Come on. What you wanna do, boy? Come on, cowboy.
translation.zh: 别冲动 你想怎么样 小子？别冲动 小子

translation.en: You wanna get rough? Come on. Take your best shot. Come on.
translation.zh: 想动粗？得了 瞄准一点 来吧

translation.en: Come on, shoot him.
translation.zh: 快啊 开枪吧

translation.en: You got the stuff?
translation.zh: 你有种吗？

translation.en: Put the gun down. JACK: Got the balls?
translation.zh: -放下枪-有种你就开枪

translation.en: Let's see you do it. Go on.
translation.zh: 开枪给我们看看 快啊

translation.en: Put it down. Put it down.
translation.zh: 放下武器

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 快啊 快

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Come on.
translation.zh: 嘿…快

translation.en: WOMAN: Get back!
translation.zh: 退后

translation.en: MAN: Get down! THORPEY: Out of the way.
translation.zh: -趴下-让开

translation.en: Watch out!
translation.zh: 当心

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 糟了

translation.en: THORPEY: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了 没事

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Come on, the ride's over. Asked me to deliver the ticket
translation.zh: -下来吧 兜风结束了-他让我来送机票 因为你过去和我兄弟一起混过我发誓

translation.en: because you used to hang around my brother.
translation.zh: 因为你过去和我兄弟一起混过我发誓

translation.en: I knew you wouldn't go for it. Who sent you?
translation.zh: -我早就知道你不会接受-谁让你来的？

translation.en: I can't tell you. You can't?
translation.zh: 我不能说

translation.en: Did you have something to do with my brother?
translation.zh: 你不能说？你和我弟弟的事有没有关系？

translation.en: I had nothing to do with your brother.
translation.zh: 我和你弟弟理查德的死一点关系都没有

translation.en: Then give me a name, or you're history.
translation.zh: 那就告诉我名字 否则你就玩完了

translation.en: Brumby's in the back.
translation.zh: 布伦比在后面

translation.en: Carter? So now you're a travel agent.
translation.zh: -卡特？-你现在成了旅行代办人了

translation.en: What? That was a real nice touch,
translation.zh: -什么？-让索普去送机票

translation.en: sending Thorpey, very nostalgic.
translation.zh: 真温馨 非常怀旧

translation.en: What the hell are you talking about? What'd Richie have on you?
translation.zh: -你到底在说什么？-理查德抓住你什么把柄了？

translation.en: Bloody hell, Jack. Richie was my friend.
translation.zh: 别扯了 杰克 理查德是我朋友

translation.en: What does it take, a fucking miracle for you to believe that?
translation.zh: 究竟发生什么怪事了让你相信是我害了他？

translation.en: You're not giving me anything here.
translation.zh: 看来你是不准备说了

translation.en: Oh, Jack, Jack, Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克…

translation.en: Jack, stop that. Stop it, for fuck's sake.
translation.zh: 别这样 看来老天爷的份上别这样

translation.en: Look, okay. I owed this bloke some money.
translation.zh: 好吧 我说 我欠那哥们一点钱

translation.en: He fronted a truckload last year to extend the club.
translation.zh: 去年俱乐部扩张的时候向他借了点

translation.en: He calls me this afternoon, says he'll wipe the slate clean
translation.zh: 今天下午他打电话说如果这次我能帮他

translation.en: if I'll do this thing for him.
translation.zh: 欠的账就一笔勾销了

translation.en: He said he wanted you out of town.
translation.zh: 他说想让你离开

translation.en: That's all. He didn't say how, just out of town.
translation.zh: 就这些了 你没说要怎么做就是不想再看见你

translation.en: Your brother was my friend, Jack. I wouldn't hurt him.
translation.zh: 你弟弟是我朋友 杰克 我不会害他的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是嘛

translation.en: Give me a name or this is going to another level.
translation.zh: 告诉我他是谁否则就是另一个层次了

translation.en: Cyrus Paice.
translation.zh: 塞勒斯派斯

translation.en: JACK: You want me out?! Huh? You want me out?!
translation.zh: 是你想除掉我？你想除掉我？

translation.en: You wanna do this? You wanna do this?
translation.zh: 你想这样吗？

translation.en: Rabbit's out of the hat. Let's see if it jumps.
translation.zh: 你已经走了一步险棋杰克 我们看看效果如何

translation.en: What'd you do to Richie? Damn you! I didn't do nothing.
translation.zh: -你对理查德做了什么？-去你的 我什么都没做

translation.en: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but you're chasing your ass.
translation.zh: 我不想告诉你这一点但是你在重复之前的错误

translation.en: You were gone too long, brother. Shit changes.
translation.zh: 你走了那么久 兄弟 世道都变了

translation.en: Maybe not you, but some shit does change.
translation.zh: 你可能没变 可有些东西确实变了

translation.en: You brother, your precious brother, Richie, was no goddamn saint.
translation.zh: 你弟弟 你亲爱的弟弟理查德也不是什么圣人

translation.en: Everybody's into something. Plain and simple, all right?
translation.zh: 谁都不干净 杰克现实就这么简单残酷 明白吗？

translation.en: There's no mystery, no intrigue.
translation.zh: 没什么秘密 也没什么阴谋

translation.en: He got juiced up one night. He got oiled up
translation.zh: 那晚他喝得酩酊大醉 一脚油门把自己撞死在一棵树上

translation.en: and he wrapped his sorry ass around a tree.
translation.zh: 一脚油门把自己撞死在一棵树上

translation.en: End of story.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: Now, if you wanna do this little dance here
translation.zh: 如果你还耿耿于怀 想挑事 杰克

translation.en: for old time's sake, Jack, bring it.
translation.zh: 如果你还耿耿于怀 想挑事 杰克 那就放马过来

translation.en: Let me tell you something, you're gonna end up
translation.zh: 我告诉你 杰克 你会输得很惨

translation.en: like a one-legged man in an ass-kicking contest.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 杰克 你会输得很惨 一瘸一拐地满地找牙

translation.en: I'm tired of your bullshit, Jack. I'm a businessman.
translation.zh: 我受够了你的胡搅蛮缠 杰克我是个商人

translation.en: I got ladies waiting for me on the inside.
translation.zh: 里面还有美女在等我呢

translation.en: Grow up, Jack.
translation.zh: 成熟一点 杰克

translation.en: DOREEN: Uncle Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克叔叔

translation.en: I didn't think you were gonna show up.
translation.zh: 没想到你会来找我

translation.en: I was in the neighborhood, you know?
translation.zh: 我正好在附近

translation.en: Listen, I'm having one of those year-long nights.
translation.zh: 听着 我现在情绪焦虑

translation.en: I don't know if I'd be fun to be around.
translation.zh: 我不知道能不能好好和你说话

translation.en: Maybe we ought to take a rain check on this.
translation.zh: 要不我们改天再聊

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: -好吧-好

translation.en: Bye. I'll give you a call tomorrow.
translation.zh: -再见-我明天给你打电话

translation.en: Doreen.
translation.zh: 多琳

translation.en: You hungry?
translation.zh: 你饿了吗？

translation.en: A little.
translation.zh: 有点

translation.en: You drink coffee? Mm, yeah.
translation.zh: 你喝咖啡？ 是的

translation.en: I smoke too.
translation.zh: 我还吸烟

translation.en: I don't know if that's worth bragging about, do you?
translation.zh: 我觉得这没有什么好炫耀的

translation.en: You smoke.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？-你也吸烟

translation.en: Well, I did. But I just recently quit.
translation.zh: 对 我以前吸 最近我戒了

translation.en: Oh, yeah? When?
translation.zh: 哦 是吗？什么时候的事？

translation.en: Oh, I'd say about...
translation.zh: 哦 差不多…

translation.en: now.
translation.zh: 现在吧

translation.en: So if you don't mind.
translation.zh: 所以如果你不介意的话

translation.en: Makes you nuts, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 快把你逼疯了 对吧？

translation.en: It's having an impact, yes.
translation.zh: 是有这种效果

translation.en: You are so freaky.
translation.zh: 你好古怪

translation.en: Well, we're all a little freaky, Doreen.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们都有点古怪 多琳

translation.en: It's those straight ones we gotta worry about.
translation.zh: 我们该担心那些不古怪的人

translation.en: So, what do you do, like, for work?
translation.zh: 说说 你做什么工作的？

translation.en: What'd your father tell you? He didn't.
translation.zh: -你爸爸怎么跟你说的？-他没说过

translation.en: That's good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Mom said you were a gambler.
translation.zh: 妈妈说你是个赌徒

translation.en: Isn't that illegal?
translation.zh: 那不违法吗？

translation.en: Are you a bookie?
translation.zh: 你是收注人？

translation.en: Bookie? No. More like, um...
translation.zh: 收注人？不是 更像是…

translation.en: More like a financial adjuster.
translation.zh: 更像是财务调解员

translation.en: So you ever been to prison?
translation.zh: 你坐过牢吗？

translation.en: For how long? How about this weather?
translation.zh: -多长时间？-要不说说天气？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 说嘛

translation.en: What do you say we change the subject?
translation.zh: 我们换个话题怎么样？

translation.en: All right. Fine.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: You ever shoot anybody?
translation.zh: 你开枪打过人吗？

translation.en: You wanna know what I do for a living?
translation.zh: 你想知道我的谋生方式？

translation.en: Simple. People make promises and they break them.
translation.zh: 很简单 有人做出承诺却言而无信

translation.en: My job is to refresh their memory.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是让他们恢复记忆

translation.en: That's about it. No big deal.
translation.zh: 就这样 没什么了不起的

translation.en: What's with the clothes?
translation.zh: 衣服怎么回事？

translation.en: What's with the jewelry in your face?
translation.zh: 你脸上戴的首饰怎么回事？

translation.en: Heh. You don't like it?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢？

translation.en: It's nice. Heh.
translation.zh: 很好看

translation.en: You ever been married?
translation.zh: 你结过婚吗？

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我想没有

translation.en: So you don't have a family of your own.
translation.zh: 所以你没有自己的家人

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你不是吗？

translation.en: DOREEN: Why'd you leave?
translation.zh: 你当初为什么要走？

translation.en: JACK: Well, Doreen, that's a long, long story.
translation.zh: 多琳 说来话长了

translation.en: DOREEN: It's a long, long ride.
translation.zh: 这一路也挺远的

translation.en: Let's put it this way.
translation.zh: 这么说吧

translation.en: You ever wanna take every mirror in the world and get rid of it
translation.zh: 你有没有过这种时候？想要毁掉世上所有的镜子

translation.en: because you didn't like what was coming back at you?
translation.zh: 因为你不想再看到镜子里的自己？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 有过

translation.en: I wish my dad was here.
translation.zh: 真希望爸爸在这里

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Do you, um...?
translation.zh: 你真的那么想吗？

translation.en: Do you really think somebody killed him?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得有人杀了他？

translation.en: Yeah, I think so, but...
translation.zh: 对 我是这么认为 可是…

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: So do you have a license yet? Yep.
translation.zh: -你有驾照吗？-有

translation.en: What, did you, like, learn that in school?
translation.zh: 是吗？在学校学的？

translation.en: Dad taught me. Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: -爸爸教我的-哦 是吗？

translation.en: Doreen, would you wait in the car?
translation.zh: 多琳 你去车上等着好吗？

translation.en: Why? Why? It's all right.
translation.zh: -为什么？-没事

translation.en: Wait in the car. I'll be right back. It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: 去车上等着 我马上来 没事的

translation.en: RECORDED VOICE [OVER PHONE]: If you'd like to make a call, please hang up and try again.
translation.zh: 如果您想外拨 请挂断重试

translation.en: If you need help, hang up and then dial the operator.
translation.zh: 如需帮助 请挂断 直接拨打接线员

translation.en: GLORIA: Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克

translation.en: You all right? Have you seen Doreen?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-你看到多琳了吗？

translation.en: What happened? Who did it? I have no idea where she is.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-我不知道她去哪了 -谁干的？-他…不知道 他直接闯进来 我…

translation.en: He came-- I don't know. He came in. I...
translation.zh: -谁干的？-他…不知道 他直接闯进来 我…

translation.en: Are you okay? You all right? It's gonna be all right.
translation.zh: 你没事吧？没事了 不会有事的

translation.en: Really.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: Why'd they do this? I don't know.
translation.zh: -他们为什么要这样？-不知道

translation.en: But I'm gonna find out, you can believe that.
translation.zh: 但我一定会查出来 相信我

translation.en: Come on, let's go get your mom. Where are we going?
translation.zh: -走吧 我们去接你妈妈-我们去哪？

translation.en: I want you guys to stay with me tonight, okay?
translation.zh: 今晚你们跟我在一起 好吗？

translation.en: Gloria, why don't we get out of here?
translation.zh: 格洛丽亚 我们离开这里吧？

translation.en: Yeah. I'm fine. I'm okay.
translation.zh: 好 我没事 没事

translation.en: I need to talk to your Uncle Jack alone.
translation.zh: 我和杰克叔叔说会儿话

translation.en: JACK: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: GLORIA: I need you to leave. JACK: What?
translation.zh: -你还是走吧 杰克-你说什么？

translation.en: My mom's coming over. We're gonna go to her place tonight.
translation.zh: 我妈一会儿就过来我们今晚去她那边 住她那儿

translation.en: We're gonna stay there. Listen, I know that you wanna help.
translation.zh: 我妈一会儿就过来我们今晚去她那边 住她那儿 听着 我知道你想帮我们

translation.en: But just look around you.
translation.zh: 可你看看你的四周

translation.en: Look what you brought into my house. Look at my face.
translation.zh: 看看你给我们带来了什么看看我的脸

translation.en: Look at my family. You're not helping, Jack.
translation.zh: 看看我的家 你不是在帮我们 杰克

translation.en: So please go.
translation.zh: 请你走吧

translation.en: Wait. What are you say--? I brought in--?
translation.zh: 等等 你说什么？我带来的…？

translation.en: I didn't bring anything into this--
translation.zh: 我没带任何…格洛丽亚

translation.en: Gloria. Look, I just wanna know the truth.
translation.zh: 我没带任何…格洛丽亚 听着 我只想知道真相理查德到底做了什么事？

translation.en: What the hell was Richie into?
translation.zh: 听着 我只想知道真相理查德到底做了什么事？

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 天啊

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh, my head hurts. That's all right.
translation.zh: -我头疼-没事

translation.en: Whatever this costs, I'll just take care of it, all right?
translation.zh: 不管要花多少钱修整我来负责 好吗？

translation.en: I think maybe you and Doreen wanna get out of town.
translation.zh: 你和多琳出城去

translation.en: Take a vacation. I'll take care of that too.
translation.zh: 去度个假 我来安排

translation.en: You shouldn't be here. Just-- We're fine. We're fine.
translation.zh: 不要留在这里了 我们没事 我们很好

translation.en: Just go.
translation.zh: 你走吧

translation.en: I'm sorry, Gloria.
translation.zh: 对不起 格洛丽亚

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I snuck out.
translation.zh: 我溜出来了

translation.en: Took a cab.
translation.zh: 打车过来的

translation.en: Grandma's house smells funny.
translation.zh: 姥姥家味道怪怪的

translation.en: Do you wanna come in?
translation.zh: 想进来吗？

translation.en: Nice tattoos.
translation.zh: 纹身不错

translation.en: I'll bring her by in the morning. Yeah, I promise.
translation.zh: 明早我送她回去 好 我保证

translation.en: All right. Good night.
translation.zh: 好了 晚安

translation.en: Your mother is a little upset.
translation.zh: 你妈妈有点生气了

translation.en: It was your idea to call her.
translation.zh: 你非要给她打电话

translation.en: Ah, listen, I don't mind.
translation.zh: 听着 我倒没关系

translation.en: She cares about you, she loves you. That's...
translation.zh: 她很担心你 她很爱你

translation.en: That's pretty special. Listen, you got one mother, right?
translation.zh: 这份爱很特别听着 你只有一个妈 对吧？

translation.en: It's a real scary place out there, so I don't blame her.
translation.zh: 外面的世界不太平 所以我不怪她

translation.en: You must be a little tired.
translation.zh: 你肯定累了

translation.en: I'll tell you what, why don't you take the bed?
translation.zh: 要不你上床睡吧？

translation.en: I got a lot of work to do in the other room, and, uh...
translation.zh: 我到另一个房间 还有很多事情要做

translation.en: I'll take you home in the morning, okay?
translation.zh: 天亮了我送你回家 好吗？

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, really.
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的 真的

translation.en: I was coming for you.
translation.zh: 我正想找你呢

translation.en: Bet you didn't know you had a fairy godmother, Jack.
translation.zh: 你肯定不知道自己还有个恩人吧 杰克

translation.en: You gave my brother a disc. What was on it?
translation.zh: 你给过我弟弟一个磁盘里面是什么？

translation.en: A fairy godmother all of your own.
translation.zh: 真的是你的恩人

translation.en: Don't play me, Geraldine, all right? No more games.
translation.zh: 别跟我耍花招了 杰拉尔汀没时间跟你玩

translation.en: No more dress up, you understand?
translation.zh: 不要再装了 明白吗？

translation.en: You gave my brother a disc.
translation.zh: 你给了我弟弟一个磁盘

translation.en: What was on it?
translation.zh: 里面是什么？

translation.en: I don't know what you're-- No.
translation.zh: -我不知道你…-不

translation.en: I'll tell you something. If you lie,
translation.zh: 我告诉你 如果你敢骗我 我就把你…

translation.en: I'm gonna break every-- Listen to me.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 如果你敢骗我 我就把你… 仔细听好

translation.en: I'm gonna break every beautiful bone in your body.
translation.zh: 我就把你全身上下每根漂亮的骨头都打断

translation.en: I'm not lying to you.

translation.en: Just get on him.
translation.zh: 快追上他

translation.en: You cocksucker!
translation.zh: 你这混蛋

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
translation.zh: 快啊

translation.en: Drive, drive, drive!
translation.zh: 开车 快点

translation.en: Where is he?
translation.zh: 他哪儿去了？

translation.en: Oh, man. Jack!
translation.zh: 哦 杰克

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 那边

translation.en: Don't turn.
translation.zh: 别转弯

translation.en: Is this what you want?
translation.zh: 这就是你想要的？

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 该死

translation.en: PEDESTRIAN: Yeah? All right with me.
translation.zh: 好了？我没事了吧

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Carter. You're not on the list.
translation.zh: 对不起 卡特先生 你不在受邀之列

translation.en: Nobody likes the list guy.
translation.zh: 没人喜欢核对受邀名单的人

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Can I help you with something?
translation.zh: 有什么能为你效劳吗？

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Jeremy Kinnear.
translation.zh: 杰里米金尼

translation.en: Look, Mr. Phone Guy, do you have any idea who I am?
translation.zh: 听着 接电话的 你知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna buy your goddamn hotel so I can fire you.
translation.zh: 我要买下你的酒店 然后炒了你

translation.en: I wanna talk to Mr. Fletcher. Les Fletcher.
translation.zh: 给我找弗莱彻先生 莱斯弗莱彻

translation.en: No, you listen to me, you neophyte toady. I am in the middle of a party here.
translation.zh: 听着 你这个新来的菜鸟我正在参加派对

translation.en: I should not be having to deal with this. Now, put me through to your boss.
translation.zh: 我不想跟你废话 快转接你老板

translation.en: Listen, why don't you girls go in the back room, and I'll...
translation.zh: 我说 要不你们几位美女先去里屋？

translation.en: I'll meet you back there in a minute.
translation.zh: 我马上就去找你们

translation.en: I got some things to take care of.
translation.zh: 我有点事要处理一下

translation.en: Did you know who she was?
translation.zh: 你知道她是谁吗？

translation.en: Excuse me? Did you knew she was my blood?
translation.zh: -你说什么？-你知道她是我侄女吗？

translation.en: Jack, are we gonna go through this goddamn little dance again?
translation.zh: 杰克 我们又要为这种小事大伤和气吗？

translation.en: Huh? Go ahead. Take out your gun, Jack.
translation.zh: 好吧 把枪亮出来 杰克

translation.en: Take out your gun in front of all these people here.
translation.zh: 让这里这些人都看看你的枪

translation.en: Put one right between my eyes.
translation.zh: 往我眉心来一发

translation.en: I don't think you could handle jail the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 你受不了下半辈子在监狱里过吧 杰克

translation.en: I wanna tell you something, slick.
translation.zh: 我告诉你吧

translation.en: The man you want
translation.zh: 你该找的

translation.en: is that little piss-ass Kinnear.
translation.zh: 是那个小混混金尼

translation.en: Him and the old guy. So stop breaking my balls, all right?
translation.zh: 他 还有那个老家伙别在我这里耍威风了 好吧？

translation.en: I'm a goddamn businessman just trying to stay afloat, just like you.
translation.zh: 我只是个商人和你一样 只为了蝇头小利

translation.en: You're nothing like me.
translation.zh: 你和我不一样

translation.en: Excuse me, wait a minute, Jack. All of a sudden you care?
translation.zh: 你说什么 等等 杰克你怎么突然那么在乎了？

translation.en: All of a sudden, what are you, some kind of fucking good guy, hm?
translation.zh: 突然就成了满腔正义的大好人了？

translation.en: Hey, you're the bad brother, remember? I know who I am. Heh.
translation.zh: -你是黑道一哥 你忘了？-用不着你来告诉我

translation.en: Well, Jack, listen, I would love to sit here and jaw with you
translation.zh: 杰克 听着 我很想和你叙叙旧

translation.en: but I gotta get back to the talent, so...
translation.zh: 可是还有人在等我 所以…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jack...
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克

translation.en: let it go.
translation.zh: 过去的就让它过去吧

translation.en: Come on, Jack, let's see what you got.
translation.zh: 起来 杰克 让我看看你有什么能耐

translation.en: Hey, hey. Hey, Jack, come on.
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克 来啊

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 来 来吧

translation.en: Goddamn, Jack.
translation.zh: 该死的 杰克

translation.en: Your little brother put up a better fight than you did.
translation.zh: 你弟弟可比你耐打多了

translation.en: MAN: Come on!
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: You should finish what you start.
translation.zh: 斩草要除根

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, you should fix your tie a little bit there.
translation.zh: 对 嘿 领带歪了 整理一下吧

translation.en: Have a good time.
translation.zh: 好好玩

translation.en: MAN: Where is it, Richie?
translation.zh: 东西在哪 理查德？

translation.en: JACK: You got a car?
translation.zh: 你有车吗？

translation.en: Let's take a ride.
translation.zh: 我们去兜兜风

translation.en: Where are we going, Mr. Carter?
translation.zh: 你要去哪 卡特先生？

translation.en: Hey. Hey, slow down. Turn the lights back on, please.
translation.zh: 嘿 慢点 把车灯打开 好吗？

translation.en: Come on, shut the door. It's not my problem.
translation.zh: -快 把车门关上-和我没关系

translation.en: I didn't do it.
translation.zh: 不是我干的

translation.en: Will you slow down, please? You're gonna kill us.
translation.zh: 你能不能慢点？会害死我们的

translation.en: Please!
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Okay, okay. What do you want? You want a clean slate?
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧你想怎么样？想消除前科案底？

translation.en: Just give me five minutes in front of a laptop.
translation.zh: 给我五分钟 让我在电脑上操作一下

translation.en: Slow down! You're gonna kill us! That's the point, Jeremy.
translation.zh: -慢点行不行 这样我们俩都活不成了-你说对了 杰里米

translation.en: Okay. You want money?
translation.zh: 好吧 你想要钱？

translation.en: Just name your price. I've got more money than God.
translation.zh: 想要钱？开个价 要多少我给多少

translation.en: You need a drink.
translation.zh: 你得喝点

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系的

translation.en: It's all right, Jeremy.
translation.zh: 没事的 杰里米

translation.en: Is this how you did it to Richie, huh?
translation.zh: 你就是这么对理查德的吧？

translation.en: This how you did it, Jeremy, huh?
translation.zh: 就是这样 对不对 杰里米？

translation.en: You think he screamed too? You like it?
translation.zh: 你觉得他有没有尖叫？ -喜欢吗？-你弟弟不是我杀的 卡特先生

translation.en: I didn't kill your brother, Mr. Carter.
translation.zh: -喜欢吗？-你弟弟不是我杀的 卡特先生

translation.en: JACK: Get up. JEREMY: Mr. Carter.
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: You're making a mistake. Get up. Move.
translation.zh: -卡特先生 你弄错了-起来 快点

translation.en: Listen to me, you're making a mistake here.
translation.zh: 请听我说 你弄错了

translation.en: Cyrus told me your brother was gonna go to the police with his disc.
translation.zh: 塞勒斯说 你弟弟会把磁盘交给警察

translation.en: And he said if he went down, I'd go down, okay?
translation.zh: 塞勒斯说 你弟弟会把磁盘交给警察 他说 要是他倒了 我也活不了

translation.en: Please... I didn't know what to do, Mr. Carter.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么做 卡特先生

translation.en: So you had him killed. No, No, no.
translation.zh: -所以你就杀了他-不不不

translation.en: I just said to him to get the disc back, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只让他把磁盘拿回来 没别的

translation.en: I had nothing to do with it. I just told Cyrus to get the disc.
translation.zh: 我发誓 不是我干的我只让塞勒斯把磁盘拿回来

translation.en: I told him to get the disc,
translation.zh: 我让他把磁盘拿回来

translation.en: and that our business together would be over.
translation.zh: 然后我和他就一拍两散

translation.en: That's all. Mr. Carter, I swear to you.
translation.zh: 就这些 卡特先生 我向你发誓

translation.en: I swear to you, I didn't do anything.
translation.zh: 我向你发誓 我什么都没干

translation.en: I didn't kill him, Mr. Carter. Please believe me.
translation.zh: 我没有杀他 卡特先生 求你相信我

translation.en: He said if I said anything
translation.zh: 他说要是我敢泄露半句

translation.en: he would ruin me.
translation.zh: 他就毁了我

translation.en: And then you came--
translation.zh: 然后你来了…

translation.en: You came along and--
translation.zh: 你来了 还…

translation.en: Please, Mr. Carter. Please, it was Cyrus.
translation.zh: 求你了 卡特先生 求你了都是塞勒斯干的

translation.en: He killed your brother and Geraldine, not me.
translation.zh: 是他杀了你弟弟还有杰拉尔汀 不是我

translation.en: He said he was working with some guy.
translation.zh: 他说他找了些人

translation.en: It was them. They did it. No more talk.
translation.zh: -是他们 他们干的-别说了

translation.en: Turn around.
translation.zh: 转过去

translation.en: Please, no, no, no. Turn around. Oh, shit...
translation.zh: -求你了 不不不-转过去

translation.en: Be a man for once in your life.
translation.zh: 有点男人样 哪怕就这一次

translation.en: I'm gonna do something for you...
translation.zh: 我要为你做一件事

translation.en: nobody ever did for me.
translation.zh: 从来没有人为我这么做过

translation.en: I'm gonna give you a second chance.
translation.zh: 我再给你一次机会

translation.en: Please don't make me come back.
translation.zh: 别让我再来找你

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会的

translation.en: I won't, Mr. Carter. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我不会的 卡特先生 谢谢

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 谢谢 太谢谢了

translation.en: I promise I won't make you come back.
translation.zh: 我保证我不会让你回来找我

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: JACK: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在干什么？

translation.en: Sorry, Jack. I don't usually get my hands dirty,
translation.zh: 对不起 杰克 这种事我通常不自己动手但是我查过你的房间了

translation.en: but I checked your room and there was nothing there, so...
translation.zh: 这种事我通常不自己动手但是我查过你的房间了 里面什么都没有 所以…

translation.en: Listen, about this, uh, Doreen thing.
translation.zh: 听着 关于多琳的事

translation.en: She'll be all right, I think.
translation.zh: 我觉得 她会没事的

translation.en: Kids are resilient, you know?
translation.zh: 孩子们会很快恢复的 你知道的

translation.en: And, uh, this thing with Richie, I mean, Christ, that was bloody awful.
translation.zh: 理查德的事 真是太惨了

translation.en: I don't know what Cyrus was thinking, but, heh, a man's got to make a living.
translation.zh: 真不知道塞勒斯是怎么想的可大家都是身不由己

translation.en: I tried to keep you out of it, but you insisted
translation.zh: 我不想让你也牵扯进来

translation.en: on this post facto big-brother thing.
translation.zh: 可你执意要扮演英雄大哥的角色

translation.en: So I figured if I left enough dangling,
translation.zh: 所以我就想 我只要耐心等着

translation.en: you would find my disc for me.
translation.zh: 你就会帮我找到磁盘

translation.en: What a mess, eh?
translation.zh: 真够乱的 是吧？

translation.en: All over a shiny piece of plastic.
translation.zh: 就为了一个亮晶晶的塑料片

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: I'll get rid of the disc,
translation.zh: 我毁了这张磁盘

translation.en: you seem to have gotten rid of everything else, so...
translation.zh: 你忘了这一切 我们…

translation.en: You may have hardware concealed about your person.
translation.zh: 你可以在硬件上做手脚隐瞒你的行径

translation.en: But remember:
translation.zh: 但你别忘了

translation.en: You kill me, you'll be on the run for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 你杀了我 下半辈子就得逃亡了

translation.en: It's been nice knowing you, Jack.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 杰克

translation.en: JACK: Brumby.
translation.zh: 布伦比

translation.en: I'm not turning round.
translation.zh: 我不会回头的

translation.en: Suit yourself.
translation.zh: 随你便

translation.en: Uncle Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克叔叔

translation.en: JACK: Your mother told me I'd find you here.
translation.zh: 你妈妈说你来这里了

translation.en: I thought you were gone. I am gone. I just wanted to come by
translation.zh: -我以为你已经走了-我是要走 就是过来

translation.en: and say goodbye to you, face-to-face.
translation.zh: 和你面对面道个别

translation.en: What, uh...? What happened to your beard thing? Oh, that?
translation.zh: -你的胡子怎么了？-哦 那个？

translation.en: Well, I thought it would be time for a change.
translation.zh: 我觉得该换个形象了

translation.en: I just got rid of it.
translation.zh: 我刮掉了

translation.en: Did you fall again?
translation.zh: 你又摔跤了？

translation.en: This?
translation.zh: 这个？

translation.en: Yeah, I did, I fell down. I gotta...
translation.zh: 对 我摔倒了

translation.en: get new shoes.
translation.zh: 我换了双新鞋

translation.en: We're gonna be okay, you know?
translation.zh: 你知道 我们都会好起来的

translation.en: Mom and me.
translation.zh: 我和妈妈

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Thanks for being here. It would've meant a lot to Dad, you know?
translation.zh: 这段时间有你在 爸爸一定很欣慰

translation.en: He was a good man. Yeah.
translation.zh: -他是个好人-对

translation.en: Guess you gotta go, huh?
translation.zh: 你该走了 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Do you remember when I said you're special?
translation.zh: 还记得我说过你很特别吗？

translation.en: You better remember that or you're gonna have a big problem with me, okay?
translation.zh: 一定要记住否则我可饶不了你 知道吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Take care of yourself, Doreen.
translation.zh: 照顾好自己 多琳

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I like the new look.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的新形象

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好
